reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent little camera!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little digital camera. It comes in a few different colors to choose from and it is very compact and lightweight, yet, sturdy at the same time. It comes with a 32 GB USD card for storage that's easy to put in and take out. It comes with a decently long charging cord to charge the camera and charges to a full charge rather quickly. It takes really good pictures for it's size and price point and has a16 X zoom. The buttons on this camera are easy to push and it's very easy to navigate through the different features of this camera. I chose the purple camera, which is a soft, muted purple. You can record with this camera, or take still photos. It takes a universal type C USB charging cord, so if you lose the charger it comes with, or it gets damaged in some way, you can use another cord that connect to your cell phone. It's easy enough to navigate through through the different features and to operate, that even a child could use it. It would make a perfect gift for Christmas, or a birthday. All in all, this is a great little camera for adults and children and I would recommend it. 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zostuic Digital Camera for Kids
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely blown away by the Zostuic digital camera for kids! This camera is perfect for young photographers who are looking to capture their memories in a fun and creative way.The camera is packed with features, including a 44MP sensor, 1080P video recording, a 2.4-inch LCD screen, and a 16x digital zoom. It also has a variety of shooting modes, like time-lapse, self-timer, and smile detection.But what I love most about this camera is how easy it is to use. My kids (ages 5 through 9) were able to figure it out right away. They loved taking pictures of their friends, family, and pets. They also had a lot of fun experimenting with the different shooting modes.The Zostuic digital camera is also very durable. It's made of sturdy plastic that can withstand a few bumps and bruises.Overall, I highly recommend the Zostuic digital camera for kids. It's a great way for young photographers to capture their memories and have fun at the same time.Here are some of the things I love about the Zostuic digital camera:-44MP sensor for high-quality photos-1080P video recording for capturing memories in motion-32GB memory card included-2.4-inch LCD screen for easy viewing-16x digital zoom for getting close-up shots-Variety of shooting modes for creative photography-Easy to use for my kids of all ages-Durable construction for everyday useIf you're looking for a great digital camera for your kids, the Zostuic is a great option. It's affordable, packed with features, and easy to use. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is good
reviews.reviewText: The camera was great for a 6yr old to use on a road trip. Easy to use ( take photos, videos, delete etc). Endured constant drops a child would do without breaking. Photos were clear and it has zoom feature. Convenient for a child to carry around the National Parks. We got the black color and so far no scratches. I’d recommend for a child beginning the love of photography. Had a memory card which was enough storage for our trip. Easy to download photos on to a computer. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My children love this camera!
reviews.reviewText: The camera is super easy to use, and my two boys really like taking pictures and videos. It's light, comes with a strap and straightforward user interface that make it suitable for children photographers. The quality of images is decent for its category, and the battery life makes it an excellent choice for outdoor adventures.The camera’s vibrant color options and compact, lightweight design make it appealing and easy to handle for little hands. It also comes with an SD card slot allows for expandable memory, which allow the children to take as much pictures as they want.This a great starter camera that encourages a child's interest in photography!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute camera for young kids to take pictures on their adventures
reviews.reviewText: My 11 year old daughter was going on a school summer camp and she wanted to take a camera with her to document the fun. This turned out to be a perfect camera for her to take. The pictures turned out great and it was great for her to have something to capture the fun and create memories from her trip. The video recording (especially the audio quality) isn't really great at all, but pictures are good enough for memories. Having an SD card slot makes it easy to pull the pictures off the camera.Instruction for your child on how to take a picture will get better results.Hold the camera still while the picture is being takenGive the camera a second or two before moving it away so the picture isn't blurryTry and not take pictures in the dark or where there isn't much lightOutdoor pictures turn out better since there is usually more light for the camera.I need to give some props to the company. I really wanted to have an extra battery to make sure she had enough, so I contacted them and they sent me 2 batteries. That was awesome and I was able to send her with enough battery to last the 3 days she was gone. The battery life was much longer than I anticipated and she only used half of the first battery. It will be great to have the extra batteries to keep it going for many many hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Camera is great quality for the price! Love the color. Comes with all the needed accessories, camera strap, charger, memory card and all. Simply designed, great functionality and easy to use. Great 1st camera for your children. Got it for my 6year old daughter, who has no camera experience besides my phone and she figured out how to use it own her own as well as record videos. Already took a ton of photos and the Images are sharp & clear. The videos are great quality. The battery last a long time before charging. Perfect camera for beginners and children. I would buy another one for myself.
